title: SatoshiVM
description: SatoshiVM is a permissioned chain built on the Frontier client software. Its native token is an ERC-20 on Ethereum

riskAnalysis.title: Two-way peg is managed by a third party
riskAnalysis.content: SatoshiVM's bitcoin wallet for bridge deposits is managed by the Bool Network. Both the Bool Network and SatoshiVM bridge UIs deposit funds into the same Bitcoin address. The bitcoin bridge contract on SatoshiVM is upgradeable by a single EOA account.

riskAnalysis.title: A permissioned validator set satisfies the data availability requirement
riskAnalysis.content: SatoshiVM's validating nodes additionally satisfy the data availability requirement. The node software is not open source, so users are unable to run a full node and validate the state of SatoshiVM.

riskAnalysis.title: Network managed by a permissioned set of operators
riskAnalysis.content: SatoshiVM's explorer currently shows 4 active validators proposing blocks. The identities of these validators is unknown.

riskAnalysis.title: Settlement assurances are provided by SatoshiVM consensus
riskAnalysis.content: Finality is guaranteed by SatoshiVM's validator set. It does not have live fraud proofs that can be submitted on Bitcoin.

content.title: SatoshiVM inherits no security from Bitcoin
content.content: SatoshiVM has no relationship with the Bitcoin mainchain.

content.title: SatoshiVM does not leak MEV to Bitcoin
content.content: SatoshiVM does not leak MEV to the Bitcoin mainchain. Users trust validators to not reorder their transactions to extract MEV.

content.title: An alternative token is not currently needed for network security
content.content: Gas fees are paid in wrapped BTC. SatoshiVM has released a token on Ethereum that currently plays no role in the network.

content.title: Bridge deposit and withdrawals pay fees to miners
content.content: Transaction fees are paid to Bitcoin miners when users deposit and withdraw funds from the BounceBit bridge. Block rewards on BounceBit are distributed to BounceBit validators.

content.title: Users trust a third party bridge provider to process withdrawals
content.content: Users trust the Bool Network to release their funds on the Bitcoin mainchain for withdrawals.

content.title: SatoshiVM is currently operated by a closed validator set
content.content: SatoshiVM's explorer shows it is operated by a small number of validators.
